Text: Ye this is an awesome torrent. But is it possible to play online? if there is please send me an email: david_vinje@hotmail.com

I have just confirmed that the trial is kinda funky and when it goes out, you will need an ISO program. The MDF file still works in powerISO which is what I use and highly recommend, because of its simplicity.
Oh, and just for future reference, It IS possible to play online with this. That is the only reason I got the game in the first place. =D
Why don't you just use Daemon? It worked fine for me
